message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more profit. How about we settle on $8500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to go down to $7500?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a bit more than $7500. How about we meet at $8200?
I'm getting close, but I still think we can do better. Would you be willing to go down to $7000?
